function Login(props) { const { email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleLogIn, handleSignUp, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError, } = props; return (
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}>Sign up

) : ( <>

Have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}>Sign in

)}
); } export default Login;
